Desc.eng: Look at that! A shiny trinket among the bones! Shall we take it?
Of course. It's an ancient medallion. They tend to be useful around here.
It's a sacrificial altar that belongs to the Spiritwalkers. I don't want them to put a curse on me. I might end up as a restless ghost, which sounds really miserable.
Thank you, Van Helsing. Thank you SO MUCH!
